typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customerscloudsalesazure
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customerscloudstreamingazure
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> AddresseCloudSalesAzure
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> AddressesCloudStreaming
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customersvanarsdelsqlserver
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerFourthCoffee
Customerscloudsalesazure, AddresseCloudSalesAzure join(Customerscloudsalesazure@CustomerID == AddresseCloudSalesAzure@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CloudSales
Customerscloudstreamingazure, AddressesCloudStreaming join(Customerscloudstreamingazure@CustomerID == AddressesCloudStreaming@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CloudStreaming
CloudSales derive(Source = 1,
		UID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnCloudSales
CloudStreaming derive(Source = 2,
		UID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnCloudStreaming
Customersvanarsdelsqlserver derive(Source = 3,
		UID = uuid(),
		crDate = substring(toString(CreatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD'),1,10),
		upDate = substring(toString(UpdatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD'),1,10)) ~> DerivedColumnVanarsdelSQL
CustomerFourthCoffee derive(Source = 4,
		UID = uuid(),
		crDate = toString(CreatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD'),
		upDate = toString(UpdatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')) ~> DerivedColumnFourthCofee
DerivedColumnCloudStreaming select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Customerscloudstreamingazure@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate_Cust = Customerscloudstreamingazure@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_Cust = Customerscloudstreamingazure@UpdatedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate_Add = AddressesCloudStreaming@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_Add = AddressesCloudStreaming@UpdatedDate,
		Source,
		UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCloudStreaming
DerivedColumnCloudSales select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Customerscloudsalesazure@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate_Cust = Customerscloudsalesazure@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_Cust = Customerscloudsalesazure@UpdatedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate_Add = AddresseCloudSalesAzure@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_Add = AddresseCloudSalesAzure@UpdatedDate,
		Source,
		UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCloudSales
SelectCloudSales, SelectCloudStreaming union(byName: true)~> UnionSaleswithStream
DerivedColumnVanarsdelSQL select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		Source,
		UID,
		crDate,
		upDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectVanarsdel
DerivedColumnFourthCofee select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		Source,
		UID,
		crDate,
		upDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFourthCoffee
SelectVanarsdel, SelectFourthCoffee union(byName: true)~> UnionVanArsdelwithFourthCoffee
UnionSaleswithStream, UnionVanArsdelwithFourthCoffee union(byName: true)~> UnionCustomerWithAddresses
UnionCustomerWithAddresses sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> trgCustomersWithAddresses

source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate_Cust as date,
		UpdatedDate_Cust as date,
		AddressID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate_Add as date,
		UpdatedDate_Add as date,
		Source as integer,
		UID as string,
		crDate as string,
		upDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customers
Customers select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCustomers
DimCustomers derive(ActiveFlag = true(),
		RecordStartDate = currentDate()) ~> DimCustomer
DimCustomer keyGenerate(output(CustomerSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> CustomerSK
CustomerSK sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Team10Synapse

source(output(
		name as string,
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as long,
		runtime as long,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as long,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> MoviesTitle
source(output(
		MovieRatingSK as integer,
		MovieRatingDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimRatings
source(output(
		MovieCategorySK as integer,
		MovieCategoryDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimCategory
MoviesTitle select(mapColumn(
		id,
		title,
		movieruntimemin = runtime,
		rating,
		genre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMovies
Category keyGenerate(output(MovieSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> MovieSK
SelectMovies, DimRatings join(rating == MovieRatingDescription,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Ratings
MovieSK select(mapColumn(
		MovieID = id,
		MovieTitle = title,
		movieruntimemin,
		MovieRatingSK,
		MovieSK,
		MovieCategorySK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMoviesCategory
SelectMoviesCategory derive(MovieSK = toInteger(MovieSK),
		movieruntimemin = toInteger(movieruntimemin)) ~> AllColumnsSK
Ratings, DimCategory join(genre == MovieCategoryDescription,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Category
AllColumnsSK sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimMovies

source(output(
		name as string,
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as long,
		runtime as long,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as long,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Movies
Movies select(mapColumn(
		rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Ratings
Ratings keyGenerate(output(MovieRatingSK as integer),
	startAt: 1L) ~> MovieRatingSK
MovieRatingSK derive(MovieRatingSK = toInteger(MovieRatingSK)) ~> ConvertionMoviRatingSK
ConvertionMoviRatingSK sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		MovieRatingSK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimRatings

source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as timestamp,
		StreamEnd as timestamp,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StreamingTransactions
StreamingTransactions derive(Source = 2,
		UID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnStreaming
DerivedColumnStreaming sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkStreamingTransactions

source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as timestamp,
		StreamEnd as timestamp,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date,
		Source as integer,
		UID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StreamingTransaction
source(output(
		CustomerSK as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		RecordStartDate as date,
		RecordEndDate as date,
		ActiveFlag as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimCustomers
source(output(
		MovieSK as integer,
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		MovieCategorySK as integer,
		MovieRatingSK as integer,
		MovieRunTimeMin as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimMovies
StreamingTransaction, DimCustomers join(StreamingTransaction@CustomerID == DimCustomers@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerSK
CustomerSK, DimMovies join(StreamingTransaction@MovieID == DimMovies@MovieID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> MoviesSK
SelectColumns keyGenerate(output(StreamingSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> StreamingSK
StreamingSK keyGenerate(output(StreamStartDateSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> StreamStartDateSK
StreamStartDateSK keyGenerate(output(StreamStartTimeSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> StreamStartTimeSK
MoviesSK select(mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		StreamStart,
		StreamEnd,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		Source,
		UID,
		CustomerSK,
		MovieSK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
StreamStartTimeSK sink(input(
		StreamingSK as integer,
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerSK as integer,
		MovieSK as integer,
		StreamStartDateSK as integer,
		StreamStartTimeSK as integer,
		StreamEndDateSK as integer,
		StreamEndTimeSK as integer,
		StreamDurationSec as integer,
		StreamDurationMin as decimal(10,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		StreamingSK,
		TransactionID,
		CustomerSK,
		MovieSK,
		StreamStartDateSK,
		StreamStartTimeSK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactStreaming
